tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NN redd) (NN holiday) (NNS cups)) (PP (IN at) (NP (NNS starbucks)))) (VP (VBP make) (NP (NP (NP (PRP me)) (NP (ADJP (IN so) (JJ happy)) (NN :-RRB-))) (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-) (NP (NP (PRP$ its)) (SBAR (S (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ small) (NNS things)) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (VP (VBP tend) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB make) (NP (PRP me))))))))) (VP (NN smile))))) (-RRB- -RRB-)) (NP (NP (NN winter)) (CC +) (NP (NN christmas))))) (. !)))
